com.google.googlemediaframeworkdemo.demo.adplayer

Class ImaPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.googlemediaframeworkdemo.demo.adplayer.ImaPlayer

  • public class ImaPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The ImaPlayer is responsible for displaying both videos and ads. This is accomplished using two video players. The content player displays the user's video. When an ad is requested, the ad video player is overlaid on the content video player. When the ad is complete, the ad video player is destroyed and the content video player is displayed again.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ImaPlayer.AdListener
      Sets up ads manager, responds to ad errors, and handles ad state changes.

    • Field Detail

      • activity

        private Activity activity
        The activity that is displaying this video player.

      • adTagUrl

        private Uri adTagUrl
        Url of the ad.

      • adPlayer

        private SimpleVideoPlayer adPlayer
        Plays the ad.

      • adPlayerContainer

        private FrameLayout adPlayerContainer
        The layout that contains the ad player.

      • adUiContainer

        private FrameLayout adUiContainer
        Used by the IMA SDK to overlay controls (i.e. skip ad) over the ad player.

      • adsLoader

        private com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.AdsLoader adsLoader
        Responsible for requesting the ad and creating the AdsManager

      • adsManager

        private com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.AdsManager adsManager
        Responsible for containing listeners for processing the elements of the ad.

      • callbacks

        private java.util.List<com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.player.VideoAdPlayer.VideoAdPlayerCallback> callbacks
        These callbacks are notified when the video is played and when it ends. The IMA SDK uses this to poll for video progress and when to stop the ad.

      • container

        private FrameLayout container
        Contains the content player and the ad frame layout.

      • contentPlayer

        private SimpleVideoPlayer contentPlayer
        Plays the content (i.e. the actual video).

      • fullscreenCallback

        private PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback fullscreenCallback
        The callback that is triggered when fullscreen mode is entered or closed.

      • oldVpu

        private com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.player.VideoProgressUpdate oldVpu
        Last recorded progress in ad playback. Occasionally the ad pauses when it needs to buffer (and progress stops), so it must be resumed. We detect this situation by noting if the difference "current progress" - "last recorded progress" = 0. If this occurs, then we can pause the video and replay it. This causes the ad to continue playback again.

      • originalContainerLayoutParams

        private ViewGroup.LayoutParams originalContainerLayoutParams
        This is the layout of the container before fullscreen mode has been entered. When we leave fullscreen mode, we restore the layout of the container to this layout.

      • playbackListener

        private final ExoplayerWrapper.PlaybackListener playbackListener
        Notifies callbacks when the ad finishes.

      • videoAdPlayer

        private final com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.player.VideoAdPlayer videoAdPlayer
        Handles loading, playing, retrieving progress, pausing, resuming, and stopping ad.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImaPlayer

        public ImaPlayer(Activity activity,
         FrameLayout container,
         Video video,
         java.lang.String videoTitle,
         com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3.api.ImaSdkSettings sdkSettings,
         java.lang.String adTagUrl,
         PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback fullscreenCallback)
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity that will contain the video player.
        container - The FrameLayout which will contain the video player.
        video - The video that should be played.
        videoTitle - The title of the video (displayed on the left of the top chrome).
        sdkSettings - The settings that should be used to configure the IMA SDK.
        adTagUrl - The URL containing the VAST document of the ad.
        fullscreenCallback - The callback that should be triggered when the player enters or leaves fullscreen.

        Parameters:

      • addActionButton

        public void addActionButton(Drawable icon,
                   java.lang.String contentDescription,
                   View.OnClickListener onClickListener)
        Creates a button to put in the top right of the video player.
        Parameters:
        icon - The image of the action (ex. trash can).
        contentDescription - The text description this action. This is used in case the action buttons do not fit in the video player. If so, an overflow button will appear and, when clicked, it will display a list of the content descriptions for each action.
        onClickListener - The handler for when the action is triggered.

      • setFullscreenCallback

        public void setFullscreenCallback(PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback fullscreenCallback)
        Set the callback which will be called when the player enters and leaves fullscreen mode.
        Parameters:
        fullscreenCallback - The callback should hide other views in the activity when the player enters fullscreen mode and show other views when the player leaves fullscreen mode.

        When you are finished using this ImaPlayer, make sure to call this method.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
